candidate Profile Description.summary: Software Engineer with a strong background in machine learning, software development, and digital marketing. Skilled in a variety of programming languages, tools, and technologies, including Python, TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, Android SDK, SQL Server, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, C#, and AWS. Experienced in developing and managing software applications and handling technical operations. Fluent in English, Urdu, Punjabi, and Arabic.
